show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Children’s Mental Health
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Barbara Shaw, chair of the Illinois Children’s Mental Health Partnership, about Illinois’... <!--more--> pioneering state-level actions to get Social and Emotional Learning into public elementary schools [icmhp.org]; also, the proposed “Strengthen Social Security” bill in Congress [to finally eliminate the cap on taxable income for SS]; poem by Mary Szybist
